languages.text: "Впрочем, разве я не принес тебе ценный дар? Настырная вездесущая Тазарра, что так долго мучала твои мирки... ты заполучил{mf||а} ее голову, я — спокойную жизнь, где она не путается под ногами". {n}Друкари тонко улыбается.{/n} "Сдохнуть от рук мон-кай — худшее наказание для чемпиона гладиаторов с арен Комморры. Последние мгновения ее жизни были пыткой".

"However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, разве я не принес тебе ценный дар? Настырная вездесущая Тазарра, что так долго мучала твои мирки... ты заполучил{mf||а} ее голову, я — спокойную жизнь, где она не путается под ногами". {n}Друкари тонко улыбается.{/n} "Сдохнуть от рук мон-кай — худшее наказание для чемпиона гладиаторов с арен Комморры. Последние мгновения ее жизни были пыткой".

Her final moments were torturous."

Her final moments were torturous."

That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

"However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

languages.text: 「しかし悪いことばかりでもないだろう？あの厄介なお節介者のタザーラは、長い間お前らのか弱き惑星を苦しめていた…お前はあの女の首を取り、俺は―うっとうしい者が消えた平和な世界を手に入れることができた」{n}彼はうっすらを笑顔を見せた。{/n}「モン＝ケイの手によって死ぬことはコモラフの闘技場の王者にとって最悪の罰だ。彼女の最期は拷問のようだったろう」
languages.original_text: "However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし悪いことばかりでもないだろう？あの厄介なお節介者のタザーラは、長い間お前らのか弱き惑星を苦しめていた…お前はあの女の首を取り、俺は―うっとうしい者が消えた平和な世界を手に入れることができた」{n}彼はうっすらを笑顔を見せた。{/n}「モン＝ケイの手によって死ぬことはコモラフの闘技場の王者にとって最悪の罰だ。彼女の最期は拷問のようだったろう」

languages.text: “不过，我不是也送给了你一份厚礼吗？那个爱管闲事、惹人厌烦的塔扎菈，总是打算侵扰你们的小小世界……你砍掉了她的脑袋，而我得到了宁静，因为她再也不会没完没了地干扰我了。”{n}他露出一丝冷淡的微笑。{/n}“对科摩罗角斗场的冠军而言，死在猴子的手上真是最可怕的惩罚。她在弥留之际，想必会痛苦万分吧。”
languages.original_text: "However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我不是也送给了你一份厚礼吗？那个爱管闲事、惹人厌烦的的塔扎菈，总是打算侵扰你们的小小世界……你砍掉了她的脑袋，而我得到了宁静，因为她再也不会没完没了地干扰我了。”{n}他露出一丝冷淡的微笑。{/n}“对科摩罗角斗场的冠军而言，死在猴子的手上真是最可怕的惩罚。她在弥留之际，想必会痛苦万分吧。”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, también te he dado una recompensa, ¿no? Esa entrometida de Tazarra había estado asaltando tus planetitas durante mucho tiempo... Ahora tienes su cabeza y yo una vida tranquila en la que no se entromete constantemente». {n}Te lanza una sonrisa estrecha.{/n} «Morir a manos de un{mf||a} mon-keigh es el peor castigo posible para una campeona de las arenas de gladiadores de Commorragh. Sus últimos momentos han sido agónicos».
languages.original_text: "However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, también te he dado una recompensa, ¿no? Esa entrometida de Tazarra había estado asaltando tus planetitas durante mucho tiempo... Ahora tienes su cabeza y yo una vida tranquila en la que no se entromete constantemente». {n}Te lanza una sonrisa estrecha.{/n} «Morir a manos de un{mf||a} mon-keigh es el peor castigo posible para una campeona de las arenas de gladiadores de Commorragh. Sus últimos momentos han sido agónicos».

languages.text: « Cependant, je vous ai déjà offert un beau présent. Cette maudite Tazarra qui a semé la pagaille pendant si longtemps dans vos petits mondes... Vous vous êtes {mf|débarrassé|débarrassée} d'elle et moi, je peux profiter de ma vie sans l'avoir constamment dans les pattes, {n}dit-il avec un léger sourire.{/n} Mourir aux mains d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh est la pire des sentences pour une championne des arènes de Commorragh. Ses derniers instants ont dû être une véritable torture. »
languages.original_text: "However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, je vous ai déjà offert un beau présent. Cette maudite Tazarra qui a semé la pagaille pendant si longtemps dans vos petits mondes... Vous vous êtes {mf|débarrassé|débarrassée} d'elle et moi, je peux profiter de ma vie sans l'avoir constamment dans les pattes, {n}dit-il avec un léger sourire.{/n} Mourir aux mains d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh est la pire des sentences pour une championne des arènes de Commorragh. Ses derniers instants ont dû être une véritable torture. »

languages.text: "Und habe ich Euch nicht auch ein großzügiges Geschenk gegeben? Diese freche, nervige Tazarra, die Eure kleinen Welten so lange gepeinigt hat ... Ihr habt ihren Kopf erhalten und ich – eine friedliche Existenz, in der sie mir nicht ständig im Weg ist." {n}Er lächelt schmal.{/n} "Durch die Hand eines Chem-Pan-Sey zu sterben, ist die schlimmste Strafe für einen Champion der Gladiatorenarenen von Commorragh. Ihre letzten Augenblicke waren eine einzige Folter."
languages.original_text: "However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

traits.locale_text: "Und habe ich Euch nicht auch ein großzügiges Geschenk gegeben? Diese freche, nervige Tazarra, die Eure kleinen Welten so lange gepeinigt hat ... Ihr habt ihren Kopf erhalten und ich – eine friedliche Existenz, in der sie mir nicht ständig im Weg ist." {n}Er lächelt schmal.{/n} "Durch die Hand eines Chem-Pan-Sey zu sterben, ist die schlimmste Strafe für einen Champion der Gladiatorenarenen von Commorragh. Ihre letzten Augenblicke waren eine einzige Folter."

languages.text: "Gerçi sana bir hediyem de oldu, yanılıyor muyum? O baş belası, her işe burnunu sokan Tazarra... Sen onun kellesini aldın, ben de yoluma çıkıp duran bir cadalozdan kurtulmuş oldum." {n}Yüzünde hafif bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh'in elinde can vermek, Commorragh'ın gladyatör arenalarında yetişen bir müdafi için en ağır cezadır. Son nefesini işkence içinde vermiş olmalı."
languages.original_text: "However, did I not give you a gracious gift as well? That pesky, meddling Tazarra who harrowed your little worlds for so long... you have garnered her head, and I — a peaceful existence where she is not constantly in my way." {n}He gives you a thin smile.{/n} "To die at the hands of a mon-keigh is the worst possible punishment for a champion of the gladiatorial arenas of Commorragh. Her final moments were torturous."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçi sana bir hediyem de oldu, değil mi? O baş belası, her işe burnunu sokan Tazzara... Sen onun kellesini aldın, ben de yoluma çıkıp duran bir cadalozdan kurtulmuş oldum.” {n}Yüzünde hafif bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} ”Bir mon-keighin eliyle öldürülmek, Commorragh’ın arenalarından yetişen bir yiğit için en ağır cezadır. Son nefesini işkence içinde vermiş olmalı."
